articles.description: The offspinner tested positive during quarantine in Queensland but could appear as soon as Monday
articles.content:
Afghanistan spinner Mujeeb Ur Rahman has been released from a Gold Coast hospital and has joined the Brisbane Heat in Canberra after recovering from Covid-19.
Mujeeb is set to be available for Monda… [+1352 chars]

articles.title: India heed Dravid's call for a big scorer, piling on the runs - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: Emerging Indian youngster Shubman Gill has put his hand up to open in the first Test, as a former great said finding a batsman who could score more than 500 runs was vital.
articles.content:
Boasting a classical technique, his half-century came off only 48 deliveries and featured nine boundaries, including some lovely cover drives.
